contextId.information: Here the word "soul" refers to Lot's thoughts and emotions. The immoral behavior of the citizens of Sodom and Gomorrah disturbed him emotionally. AT: "was greatly disturbed" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_synecdoche]])
contextId.quote: was tormented in his righteous soul

contextId.information: Here the word "souls" refers to persons. AT: "They entice unstable people" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_synecdoche]])
